title: I cannot start or properly install League
body:
This morning I tried to start League after an update (I assume for the Star Guardian skins) and I was met with a reoccurring message that stated a dll file in the 0.0.0.92 release folder (I didn't get a screenshot and forgot the exact file address) was unable to start/incompatable with a Windows startup. I decided after attempts to force the client to patch with no luck to reinstall League. After starting the installed launcher, it freezes up in the splash screen and after some waiting Windows then suggests to debug it:
https://imgur.com/UC1Pq5t
I can't progress from there. Are there any known issues that you're aware of @Riot? May I have assistance in getting League running? Thanks in advance for your help!

ps I am DYING to play the SG Ahri skin. Please Riot I cannot wait another day. <3 {{champion:103}}

replies.body: This error happens when an OS or antivirus security setting is blocking game files from being access.  You'll want to go over the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to add League as an exception and resume the install/update.  I hope that helps!
